title: Headstack articles in WBC page will open with the WBC header
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the wbc site
custom_steps: WHEN I click on a regular news article within Headline Stack
custom_expected: THEN I should see the article open in the same page with WBC header

title: Long form or waterfall articles in WBC Headline Stack  will open with in new tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN I am on the WBC page
custom_steps:
WHEN I find a waterfall article within the HEADLINE STACK
AND I click on it
custom_expected: THEN I should see the article open in a new tab

title: getPage query will be triggered on WBC news articles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I have a news article to open in WBC context: world-baseball-classic/news/mlb-players-with-options-for-2025
AND I have graphQL extension installed on my browser
AND I have it enabled and open in my browser
custom_steps: WHEN I load the page with the correct env URL
custom_expected: THEN I should see a getPage query triggered on page load
